thread.title: Free Summer Plant Collection Worth £25
thread.title_full: Free Summer Plant Collection Worth £25 - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Free Summer Plant Collection Worth £25
text: Readers can claim a free summer plant collection worth £25, just pay £5.65 postage. Collection is supplied as young plants to flower through summer and includes: - Euonymus ‘Emerald Gaiety’ - Lavatera ‘Barnsley Baby’ - Helianthemum ‘Ben Fhada’ - Hollyhock ‘Chater's Double Mixed’ - Dianthus ‘Gran's Favourite’ The collection is ‘drought-tolerant’ so will survive any heat waves over the summer. How To Claim: See the newspaper on Sunday, July 19, 2015. Follow @telegraph
